data: `minecraft:spawn_entity` adds a timer after which this entity will spawn another entity or item (similar to vanilla's chicken's egg-laying behavior).

data.Name: entities
data.Description: A list of entities to spawn in

data.Name: filters
data.Description: If present, the specified entity will only spawn if the filter evaluates to true.

data.Name: max_wait_time
data.Description: Maximum amount of time to randomly wait in seconds before another entity is spawned.

data.Name: min_wait_time
data.Description: Minimum amount of time to randomly wait in seconds before another entity is spawned.

data.Name: num_to_spawn
data.Description: The number of entities of this type to spawn each time that this triggers.

data.Name: should_leash
data.Description: If true, this the spawned entity will be leashed to the parent.

data.Name: single_use
data.Description: If true, this component will only ever spawn the specified entity once.

data.Name: spawn_entity
data.Description: Identifier of the entity to spawn, leave empty to spawn the item defined by "spawn_item" instead.

data.Name: spawn_event
data.Description: Event to call when the entity is spawned.

data.Name: spawn_item
data.Description: Item identifier of the item to spawn.

data.Name: spawn_method
data.Description: Method to use to spawn the entity.

data.Name: spawn_sound
data.Description: Identifier of the sound effect to play when the entity is spawned.
